/*
Return a greatest common divisor of two integers a and b
>>> greAtesT_commOn_dIvisoR(3, 5)
1
>>> greAtesT_commOn_dIvisoR(25, 15)
5
*/
#include<stdio.h>
using namespace std;
int greAtesT_commOn_dIvisoR(int a, int b){
    int gcd;
    while(b!= 0){
        gcd = a % b;
        a = b;
        b = gcd;
    }
    return a;
}

/*
Return a least common multiple of two integers a and b
>>> lcm(3, 5)
15
>>> lcm(25, 15)
60
*/
int lcm(int a, int b){
    return a * b / greAtesT_commOn_dIvisoR(a, b);
}

15

60

>>> sum(3, 5)
8
>>> sum(25, 15)
45
*/
int sum(int a, int b){
    return a + b;
}

/*
Return the difference of two integers a and b
>>> diff(3, 5)
2
>>> diff(25, 15)
20
*/
int diff(int a, int b){
    return a - b;
}

/*
Return the quotient of two integers a and b
>>> quo(15, 60)
3
>>> quo(60, 15)
3
>>> quo(20, 15)
2
>>> quo(15, 20)
0
>>> quo(20, 20)
0
>>> quo(15, 20)
0
>>> quo(20, 20)
0
*/
int quo(int a, int b){
    if(a == 0){
        return 0;
    }
    else{
        return b / a;
    }
}

/*
Return the remainder of two integers a and b
>>> rem(15, 60)
15
>>> rem(60, 15)
0
>>> rem(20, 15)
20
>>> rem(15, 20)
0
>>> rem(20, 20)
0
*/
int rem(int a, int b){
    if(a == 0){
        return 0;
    }
    else{
        return a % b;
    }
}

60480
*/
